subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The Tour de France winner Cadel Evans won the first full stage of the Criterium du Dauphine race, a hilly 116-mile ride from Seyssins to Saint-Vallier in the French Alps.
snippet: The Tour de France winner Cadel Evans won the first full stage of the Criterium du Dauphine race, a hilly 116-mile ride from Seyssins to Saint-Vallier in the French Alps.
